scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:redis" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:builds" "npm run dev:launches" "npm run dev:workflows" "npm run dev:materializer" "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix services/catalog && npm run lint --prefix apps/frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix services/catalog && npm run build --prefix apps/frontend
scripts.dev:api: cd services/catalog && PORT=4000 HOST=:: npm run dev
